amendment.description: An amendment numbered 121 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce any recommendation of the Interagency Working Group on Mining Regulations, Laws, and Permitting of the Department of the Interior.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Owens amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Owens amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Owens amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.
